name: Sweet Potatoes
properties: Lower glycemic load than white potatoes
Underground vegetable choice for weight loss
benefits: Sweet potatoes are specifically recommended over white potatoes for weight loss optimization due to their lower glycemic load. They provide satisfying fullness while having less impact on blood sugar. Their fiber content and nutrient density make them an excellent choice for any meal.
amount: Use as preferred underground vegetable choice

quotes: If you want to go underground, on the basis of what we learned about glycemic load, sweet potatoes would be preferable to white.
